blocks.description: Your trusted choice, bridging talented Vietnam to global markets through: Quality, Responsibility, Innovation

timeline.event: Foundation established with the creation of the parent company in France, specializing in agricultural trade.
Network expansion to USA and Thailand, diversifying product portfolio into apparel and furniture.
VINHAPAC established in Vietnam, focusing on leveraging local high-quality production and supply capabilities.
Achieved ISO 9001:2015 certification, successfully exporting to over 20 countries, affirming position as a trusted global partner.
